title: Report a Zoning Violation
description: A citizen reports that a neighbor is running a commercial business out of their home in a residential-only zone.

tasks.description: Gather the address of the alleged violation and the details of the complaint.
Verify the zoning for the property in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses a GIS tool to confirm the property is in an R-1 (single-family residential) zone.

tasks.description: Create a new case for a zoning inspector to investigate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs a new case for the zoning enforcement department.
